topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Alpha: Technical Specifications

body.p: This page introduces you to the technical specifications of the HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade environment that you will be installing.

For more information on the HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade environment, also see the Reference Logical Architecture section in the HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Alpha: Administrator Guide.

section.title: Dimensions and Limits
section.p: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade has been verified to work up to the following maximum system configuration:

ul.li: up to 50 compute nodes in the KVM region
up to 500 virtual machine instances* can be configured
up to four network interface cards per compute node
maximum eight AVP vNICs per guest
maximum eight SR-IOV vNICs per guest

section.p: * Up to 10 VMs per compute node (no over-subscription); 20 core maximum
